article_title: Starbucks' Tuition Benefit Makes College More Affordable, But It Still Needs To Get Cheaper

article_metadata.author: Mark Rogowsky

og.description: Starbucks is offering a new benefit to its employees starting today that's fairly extraordinary in the retail world: It will help them get a college degree that most will then use to find a job that isn't at Starbucks. Just how many of the coffee chain's 135,000 employees will take [...]
